LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.WebPImages.IsNoRegisted
LocaleResource.Value: Unregistered version (trial period 15 days and 500 pictures).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.WebPImages.IsExpired
LocaleResource.Value: Your license has expired, you should renew the license with a 50% discount.

LocaleResource.Value: Write debugging information into file. In ~/App_Data/ folder.

LocaleResource.Value: Enable lossy compression, by default plugin uses lossless compression.

LocaleResource.Value: Configure Lossy Compression Quality, default value 90.

LocaleResource.Value: The settings have been updated successfully.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.WebPImages.Error.OverWrittenClass.IStaticCacheManager
LocaleResource.Value: Error. The class IStaticCacheManager was overwriten the new class '{0}'. Uninstall another plugin or change it.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.WebPImages.Error.OverWrittenClass.IPictureService
LocaleResource.Value: Error. The class IPictureService was overwriten the new class '{0}'. Uninstall another plugin or change it.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.WebPImages.RestartNopcommerce
LocaleResource.Value: Don't forget to restart your nopcommerce when you changed settings.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.WebPImages.Download.Error
LocaleResource.Value: Error. Please disable the plugin on this page. The plugin can't download the lastest Magick.NET libraries because they are locked by nopcommerce.
